mapper.select: select tplc.id, u.name as userName, tplc.create_time, tplc.update_time, tplc.test_plan_id, tplc.load_case_id, lt.status, lt.name as caseName from test_plan_load_case tplc inner join load_test lt on tplc.load_case_id = lt.id inner join user u on lt.user_id = u.id where tplc.test_plan_id = #{planId}
